resources.string: Please fill out all fields to proceed.
Please enter a valid email address.
An account with this email address already exists.
The email address or password is incorrect. If you\'ve created or logged into your account with Google before, please sign in with Google instead.
Login failed. Try logging in again or sign in with Google.
Login with Google failed. Please login with your email or try again later.
Registration with Google failed. Please register with your email or try again later.
